name: ab2rexex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), universe)

stmt.origin: abrexex2(s0, s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
stmt.pretty: abrexex2(s0, s1, c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 = c2))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s2, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s2, c1)

comment: Existence of a class abstraction of existentially restricted sets. Variables ` x ` and ` y ` are normally free-variable parameters in the class expression substituted for ` C ` , which can be thought of as ` C ( x , y ) ` . See comments for ~ abrexex . (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2011.)
